briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Distance Measurement Client model instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a bt_mesh_dm_res_entry memory object.
Array size of bt_mesh_dm_res_entry memory object.
Pointer to bt_mesh_dm_cli_handlers structure or NULL.
Pointer to a Distance Measurement Client model instance.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_dm_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_dm_cfg *set, struct bt_mesh_dm_cli_cfg_status *rsp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_dm_cli_config

briefdescription.para: Set or get the config state in the Distance Measurement server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_dm_cli_handlers::cfg_status_handler callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
New configuration parameters, or NULL to get the current parameters.
Status response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.
The supplied configuration parameters are invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_dm_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_dm_cli_start *start, struct bt_mesh_dm_cli_results *rsp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_dm_cli_measurement_start

briefdescription.para: Start a distance measurement on a Distance Measurement server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_dm_cli_handlers::result_handler callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
Distance measurement Start parameters.
Status response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.
The supplied configuration parameters are invalid or the address is not a unicast address.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_dm_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, uint8_t entry_cnt, struct bt_mesh_dm_cli_results *rsp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_dm_cli_results_get

briefdescription.para: Get measurement results from a Distance Measurement server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_dm_cli_handlers::result_handler callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
Number of entries the user wish to receive.
Status response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.
Invalid entry count provided.
